meanings.definition: A low upholstered seat without a back or arms.
meanings.sent1: I sat on the ottoman to tie my shoelaces.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered around the ottoman to play a board game.
meanings.sent3: The ottoman looked sad without anyone sitting on it.
meanings.sent4: The ottoman stood quietly in the corner, waiting for someone to rest their feet on it.
meanings.sent5: The soft velvet ottoman added a touch of elegance to the living room.

meanings.definition: A heavy ribbed fabric made from silk and either cotton or wool.
meanings.sent1: She sewed a beautiful dress using ottoman fabric.
meanings.sent2: The ottoman fabric was perfect for making winter coats.
meanings.sent3: The ottoman fabric felt cozy against my skin.
meanings.sent4: The ottoman fabric shimmered in the sunlight like a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: I love the rich texture of ottoman fabric in my home decor.

meanings.definition: A Turk of the family or tribe of Osman.
meanings.sent1: The ottoman was proud of his heritage.
meanings.sent2: Many Ottomans settled in the new city.
meanings.sent3: The Ottoman joked about being related to the sultan.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an Ottoman leading her team to victory.
meanings.sent5: The Ottoman's bravery inspired others to follow in his footsteps.
